3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent dimensional transformation and proper isometric-like projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful room adjacency and wall positions throughout the plan.

interior_elements.notes: Excellent furniture placement; kitchen cabinetry and bathroom fixtures are correctly localized.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; lighting is even and geometry is sharp.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of window openings compared to 2D line-work.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains high geometric integrity and accurate furniture mapping from the 2D source.
